mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.product_option_id, c.product_count, c.product_YN, o.color, o.size, p.product_base_price + o.additional_price AS final_price, p.product_name, c.cartCheckbox FROM modeling.user_shopping_cart c JOIN modeling.product_option o ON c.product_option_id = o.product_option_id JOIN modeling.product p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} and c.product_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO modeling.user_shopping_cart (user_id, product_option_id, product_count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productOptionId}, #{productCount}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE product_count = product_count + VALUES(product_count)
mapper.update: UPDATE modeling.user_shopping_cart c JOIN modeling.product_option po ON c.product_option_id = po.product_option_id JOIN modeling.product p ON po.product_id = p.product_id SET c.product_count = #{productCount}, c.total_price = #{productCount} * (po.additional_price + p.product_base_price) WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.product_option_id = #{productOptionId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM modeling.user_shopping_cart WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND product_option_id = #{productOptionId}
